---
title: Lewy Bodies
---

Lewy Bodies refer to alpha-synuclein cytoplasmic inclusions, which are misfolded proteins that clump together @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019. 



:::{.callout-note}
“Physical manifestation of lewy bodies in the brain, whereas Dementia is the cognitive manifestation of lewy bodies in the brain” -Adria Thompson
:::
